body:
Well, my headphones broke. To be exact, all 3 of them broke. And I lost my earbuds too. Yeah I'm basically the most organized and responsible person on the planet, just saying.
Anyways, I wanna know what YOU guys use for listening to electronically produced sound waves :D

replies.body:
These are my first pair of headphones. They're very good quality and only $20, which is amazing :3 
Here's the one I have right now, though, because the old ones broke after about half a year. They're pretty good and $20, but the old ones were better (:
